ComicInfo.Summary:
Rita’s continued manipulations begin to succeed in turning the Rangers against Zordon.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Dan Mora | 1 | B | Cover B | Miguel Mercado | 2 | Var | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Locker Variant Cover | Michelle Wong | 3 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | Var | Unlocked Paper Doll Sketch Cover | Audrey Mok | 5 | *Notes:* The Cover A is a homage of the movie poster for Adventures in Babysitting.The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Teen Wolf.
